name: Databricks Minimal Notebook
description: I find that the default Databricks notebook style wastes way too much space. That's why I created this minimal theme. It gets rid of useless toolbars, eliminates elements that are not needed in notebook view and merges two toolbars.
additional_info:
I haven't come across any problems with the style so far but no guarantess - I'm far from being a web developer.

Also, I wasn't able to limit the scope for firefox since I'm using Chrome which allows me to pick the website scope myself. So I trust you to be able to limit the scope yourself if you're using firefox. Please do let me know how to do this and I will update the style.
